segments.text: Hi , Lilly , it â€™ s so nice to see you again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hum , me too . This winter holiday was especially long . What have you done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing special . I had a get-together with some schoolmates at the high school , visited the Internet and read a couple of books which I had been longing for . How about yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I like traveling . I made good use of this long vacation and enjoyed myself .
segments.speaker: S2
